channel.title: Tool for load testing?
channel.description:
If I remember correctly someone at some point somewhere had a tool that would connect to a server many many times with "valid" clients that would perform actions just to test a servers capacity and speed.
Is this still floating around somewhere?
Really don't want to spend time making it if it's already done.

item.title: Tool for load testing?
item.dc:creator: @AridTag AridTag
item.description:
@AridTag wrote:

Yep, thanks for that. This one is a bit ridiculous as it’s just pure spam but whatever. Yeah if you can get that one real quick that would also be appreciated. If not I’ll ask myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Tool for load testing?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I PM’ed you the link but you would have better luck asking ry0000003 for the newer tool that he made. I believe his new tool has the right packets to make the bots walk and talk. I’ll see if I can get it for you real quick.

Read full topic
